lead_paragraph: NBC Universal Sports will stream 2,200 hours of live Summer Games coverage free from Beijing next year on its Web site, nbcolympics.com. It is the first time that NBC, or any network, has carried the Olympics on the Internet. . The broadband coverage will augment another 1,400 on NBC, USA, MSNBC, CNBC and Telemundo.
